message.content:
The question asks for the addition in the amount owed by the entity for goods or services received or purchased on credit during the period. This generally corresponds to the change in "Accounts Payable" in the cash flow statement.

Looking at the table:

| Account                                  | Amount      | Date       |
|-----------------------------------------|-------------|------------|
| Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Payable | 1820000.00  | 2024-01-28 |

This line item shows an increase of 1,820,000.00 in Accounts Payable, which is the amount owed by the entity for goods or services received or purchased on credit.

Hence, the solution is:

```json
{"solution": {"value": "1820000.00"} }
```
